title: Bug 124610 - Error when adding a filter to a boolean computed column
description: When attempting to add a filter on a boolean computed column, an error is encountered.
OB: When trying to add a filter on a boolean computed column, an error occurs.
EB: Save the filter configuration and preview the results. The expected outcome is that the filter should work as intended. The actual result is an error message: 'data.engine.ConvertToDataTypeError (1 time(s))' with details: 'org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: cannot be converted to class java.lang.Boolean.'
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the 'Filter Configuration' section.
3. Select a boolean computed column as the target for the filter.
4. Configure the filter settings as desired.
5. Click 'Save' to apply the filter.
6. Click 'Preview' to view the filtered results.
